title: Help with this font
content:
Sans Serif font used for NUE series by Einaudi...

author: Francesco78

comments.content: Don't know if it's the one but it's very close to [Metallophile Sp8](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/metallophile-sp8) using alternate [a](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/metallophile-sp8/light/glyphs.html#glyphs/491508/183).

Hi, is this a font that you can name?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cinderella-2_3703.jpg)
